chameleon.core.reference
Interface CrossReference<E extends CrossReference,P extends Element,D extends Declaration>

All Superinterfaces:
Element<E,P>
All Known Implementing Classes:
ElementReference, ElementReferenceWithTarget, Invocation, NamedTarget, NamespaceOrTypeReference, NamespaceReference, NonConstructorInvocation, ObjectOrientedLanguage.DummyTypeReference, SimpleReference, SpecificReference, TypeReference, VariableOrTypeReference, VariableReference
public interface CrossReference<E extends CrossReference,P extends Element,D extends Declaration>
extends Element<E,P>

This interface represents the concept of a cross references in the model. For proper functioning, every cross reference (method call, variable reference, type reference,...) must implement this interface.
